K1M7Vj1W1VM.title: Flickr lets you choose a copyright license

tosdr.case: you can choose the copyright license
tosdr.tldr: The copyright license granted to Yahoo for photos, graphics, audio and video is limited “solely for the purpose for which such Content was submitted or made available”. In addition, Flickr integrates a set of Creative Commons licenses you can choose from.

U11qApwNL2M.title: Users are subject to Yahoo!'s terms

tosdr.case: your use is subject to a policies, guidelines, etc.
tosdr.tldr: “When you use Flickr, you are subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service and Yahoo! Community Guidelines.” To find out about Yahoo!'s terms, please read the ToS;DR report.

WEwv5V2M9zw.title: Yahoo's copyright license for photos, graphics, audio and video limited for purpose

tosdr.case: limited for purpose of same service
tosdr.tldr: The copyright license granted to Yahoo for photos, graphics, audio and video is limited “solely for the purpose for which such Content was submitted or made available”.

sZ6MVIwA-tE.title: You can chose with whom you share your photo

tosdr.case: you can choose with whom you share content
tosdr.tldr: “You can specify whether or not you want your photos to be accessible to the public, accessible to a select few, or private (only you can access them with your Yahoo! ID and password)”
